name: env-checker
description: Env checker shows you the difference between two .env files from source to destination.

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp ./src/index.html ./dist/ && cp -a src/styles dist && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/  --inline --hot --progress --color --host=0.0.0.0
scripts.build:chrome: NODE_ENV=chrome && mkdir -p extension && cp -a manifest.json extension &&  cp -a background.js extension && cp -a src/index.html extension && cp -a icons extension && cp -a src/styles extension && webpack -p

author: Syed Sirajul Islam Anik
